thread.title: Happy Customer
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Happy Customer

author: Happy Customer
title: Happy Customer
text: I've purchased a lot of fragrances and cosmetics online and from some of the high end department stores like Saks Fifth, Neiman Marcus and Nordstrom but I've never once seen the items come so well packaged. Nothing got spilled or broken and the box was sent in a waterproof bag so I did not have to worry about getting delivery dropped at my front door. In addition the order was shipped very quickly. I have to say it's the best experience I ever got in my 10 years of online shopping. I will definitely order DIOR products at DIOR website from now on instead of ordering from department stores.
